title: wireless protocol
extract: Also referred to as "Wireless Personal Area Networks," or WPAN, short-range wireless protocols operate at lower frequencies between devices that are usually only a few feet apart. Bluetooth is a popular short-range protocol.
extract_html: Also referred to as "Wireless Personal Area Networks," or WPAN, short-range wireless protocols operate at lower frequencies between devices that are usually only a few feet apart. Bluetooth is a popular short-range protocol.
